rows.label: bf11140100_0025
rows.name:
That's the Blade and that kid
from before, ain't it?

rows.label: bf11140100_0040
rows.name:
Yep. The whole village was torched,
just like we thought.

rows.label: bf11140100_0045
rows.name:
Thanks to that, I managed to pick up
some good Core Crystals.

rows.label: bf11140100_0050
rows.name: And I found one more interesting thing, too...

rows.label: bf11140100_0060
rows.name:
Alright. In that case,
I'll handle things here how I see fit.

rows.label: bf11140100_0090
rows.name:
Talk about a twist of fate. To think Iira's hidden
treasure, the one I stole, would come right back to me.
